subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: In a game crowded with seven current All-Stars, Dwyane Wade stood out with 38 points and 5 assists in the Heat’s victory in the opener of the Eastern Conference semifinal series.
snippet: In a game crowded with seven current All-Stars, Dwyane Wade stood out with 38 points and 5 assists in the Heat’s victory in the opener of the Eastern Conference semifinal series.
